name: 4th Pension Funds & Alternative Investments Africa Virtual Conference
content: Following the great success of PIAfrica 2019, the 4th edition of Pension Funds and Alternative Investments Africa Conference is confirmed for 20 â€“ 21 March 2020 in Mauritius. PIAfrica 2020 will bring again together key stakeholders from the sector across Africa and industry expert speakers for 2 days of intense debate and high-level networking.
